Element.name: IntermediateCatchingTimerEvent
Element.Description: A <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process/Events/TimerEvents/IntermediateCatchingTimerEvent"/> triggers when specific time-date or a specific cycle strike. If used within the main flow it acts as a delay mechanism. If used for exception handling it will change the Normal Flow into an Exception Flow
Element.Action: Convert this event into a different catching event.
Convert this event into a different throwing event.
